hanzi-su-wiki:
挿

Значения

Вкладывать, вставлять, втыкать

Мнемоника

Рукой 扌 вонзать копье во врага, чтобы оно торчало бы, как пест 午 из ступки 臼.

Варианты

插, 揷
purpleculture_pinyin:
chā
Japanese variant of 插
Японский вариант вставки
rtega_mnemonic:
插插RS
挿挿		揷insert, stick into, plant
  • hand 扌 inserting a pestle into a mortar 臿/𢆍
heisig_constituent: insert, finger, fingers, thousand, armour, armor, roots
heisig_story: Fingers . . . thousand . . . roots. Observe how the writing order does not follow the elements in order, because the final stroke is used for two different elements.
koohiiStory1: A rice farmer´s delicate fingers have inserted 1,000 rooted seedlings into his field.
koohiiStory2: Imagine a crazy japanese hentai: multiple fingers and thousand of root-like tentacles are inserting themselves in... well, I think you can fill the rest.
jp_example_words: 挿す(さす): to insert, put in, graft
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You have fingers in the thousands and while looking up at the sun you decide you want to insert them in there.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Hold your thousand+ fingers up to the sun and imagine inserting them into the sun's super-hot ... s-sun lava. (That's what it is, right? Yeah, let's go with that.)
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You insert one finger, it burns up immediately, and its soul (そう) comes flying out screaming for a moment before it disappears. Hmm. You insert another finger and as it burns up, another little soul comes out screeching, "WHY WOULD YOU INSERT ME IN THERE!" and is gone.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Since you have a thousand fingers too many, you decide to insert them all into the sun and watch as their souls pop out. You listen to the little souls scream at you.
Ru_Radicals: ｜, ノ, 十 (десять), 扎, 日 (день), 田 (рисовое поле)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the hand (扌) says (申) 1000 (千) times it wants to be inserted

挿す(さす): to insert, put in, graft

挿字的基本解释

挿
chā
古同“插”。

挿字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chā］
同“插1”。
按，亦为“插”的日本用简体汉字。

挿字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　挿； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页432第17
俗插字。

Name meaning
Nothing.
chā
яп. вм. 插
Radicals: 扌, 千, 日  (fingers, thousand, sun)
Meaning Mnemonic
You have fingers in the thousands and while looking up at the sun you decide you want to insert them in there.
Hold your thousand+ fingers up to the sun and imagine inserting them into the sun's super-hot ... s-sun lava. (That's what it is, right? Yeah, let's go with that.)
Reading Mnemonic
You insert one finger, it burns up immediately, and its soul (そう) comes flying out screaming for a moment before it disappears. Hmm. You insert another finger and as it burns up, another little soul comes out screeching, "WHY WOULD YOU INSERT ME IN THERE!" and is gone.
Since you have a thousand fingers too many, you decide to insert them all into the sun and watch as their souls pop out. You listen to the little souls scream at you.
